trans:
Em
Our hearts have turned to steel, no one recognizes us anymore,
Bm
We have forgotten our past lives.
Am
Eternal glory to those who defend their home,
Bm Bm7
And to those who are no longer with us.
[Chorus]:
Em
I saw steel and the sky falling,
Bm
I saw things no one should ever see.
Am
I saw pain enough for ten lifetimes,
Bm Bm7
Mother, pray for your sons.
Em
I saw fear in the eyes opposite,
Bm
I learned my enemy's profile well.
Am
I saw pain enough for ten lifetimes,
Bm Bm7
Mother, pray for the souls of your sons.
[Bridge]:
Em Bm
Pray, mother, pray.
Am
I saw pain enough for ten lifetimes,

Mother, pray!
